analysis.Summary: Vue SFC that renders an SVG ‘info’ icon whose stroke color can be customized via a `fill` prop.
analysis.Purpose: Provide a reusable, color‐configurable ‘info’ icon component (`IconInfo`) for use across the application’s UI.

Components.name: IconInfo
Components.responsibility: Render a circular information icon (SVG) and accept a `fill` prop to set the stroke color.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.description: Vue Composition API helper that declares the component props interface in `<script setup>`.

fill.description: CSS color value used for the SVG stroke.

analysis.Usage: Import and register (or auto‐import) `IconInfo.vue` in parent components. Example: `<IconInfo fill="#FF0000"/>` to render a red info icon.
Notes: No `<style>` block is present; relies on external/global CSS for sizing and extra classes.
SVG dimensions are hardcoded to 64×64 but can be overridden by wrapping container styles if needed.
Uses Vue 3 `<script setup>` syntax; ensure the project build supports Vue 3 SFCs.
